name: Pixelated Pinball
description:
Play some pinball with just 64x64 pixels!

Post a screenshot of your high score!

Controls

  • Launch Ball - Tap Launch Button / S / Spacebar / DownArrow
  • Left Flipper - Tap Left Half of Screen / A / LeftArrow
  • Right Flipper - Tap Right Half of Screen / D / RightArrow

The music tracks were created by William Maupin for this game and are used under license.

Game design, art, and programming by Studio Barefoot.

Created for the LowRez 2022 Game Jam!
